mapper.select: select count(*) from user_indexes where table_name = upper(#{value}) and index_type != 'LOB'

select sysdate - min(last_analyzed) min_last_analyzed from (select nvl(last_analyzed, sysdate-1) last_analyzed from user_tables where table_name in upper(#{i}) union all select nvl(last_analyzed, sysdate-1) last_analyzed from user_tab_partitions where table_name in upper(#{i}) union all select nvl(last_analyzed, sysdate-1) last_analyzed from user_indexes where table_name in upper(#{i}) and index_type != 'LOB' union all select nvl(last_analyzed, sysdate-1) last_analyzed from user_ind_partitions where index_name in (select index_name from user_indexes where table_name in upper(#{i}) ) )
